root: ^H... How can I see you? You are supposed to be dead... What is happening?

Am_Dead: ^But if you are dead then why can I see you? I don't understand what's happening.
Wanted_to_see: ^I miss you so much. It's been hard since you died. Will I see you again?
Some_day: ^I suppose one day when I die too then we could see each other. Maybe its true what they say...
Dont_know: ^I really hope that I can see you again. Know that although you are dead, we will always love you and we will never forget you.
Time_To_Go: ^I understand. Thank you for being here and talking to me this one last time. I.. don't know what to say other than I love you and I hope to see you again some day.
